name: Jasine Babu
content: Jasine | IIT Palakkad Englishहिन्दी A- A A+ 0491 209 2013 (Office) | info@iitpkd.ac.in INDIAN INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY PALAKKAD Kanjikode | Palakkad | Kerala - 678623 0491 209 2001 (Office) | info@iitpkd.ac.in Dr. Jasine BabuAssociate ProfessorComputer Science And EngineeringResearch Area: Theoretical Computer Science - mainly Graph Theory and Algorithms Biosketch 2023 to till date. Associate Professor in Computer Science and Engineering (currently also serving as HoD CSE) IIT Palakkad 2016 to 2023. Assistant Professor in Computer Science and Engineering IIT Palakkad 2015-2016. Principal Scientist IIT Palakkad 2014-2015. Post-doc in Computer Science University of Haifa, Israel Adviser: Ilan Newman 2009-2013. PhD in Computer Science Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore Adviser: L. Sunil Chandran Thesis: Algorithmic and Combinatorial Questions on some Geometric Problems on Graphs 2007-2009. Lecturer in Computer Science and Engineering National Institute of Technology Calicut 2006-2007. Software Engineer Motorola India Pvt. Ltd., Bangalore 2004-2006. M.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering National Institute of Technology Calicut Project adviser: Vinod Pathari 2003-2004. Software Engineer Stablix Solutions Pvt. Ltd. Thiruvananthapuram Teaching Aug-Dec 2022 CS 5009 - Algorithms CS 5633 - Model Checking Jan-May 2022 CS 2040 - Design and Analysis of Algorithms Aug-Dec 2021 CS 2030 - Data Structures and Algorithms CS 2130 - Data Structures and Algorithms Lab Feb-May 2021 CS 2040 - Design and Analysis of Algorithms CS 5010 - Graph Theory and Combinatorics Aug 2020-Jan 2021 CS 5009 - Algorithms CS 5004 - Approximation Algorithms Jan-April 2020 CS 2020 - Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science Aug-Dec 2019 CS 2010 - Logic for Computing CS 3510 - Operating Systems Laboratory Jan-April 2019 CS 5004 - Approximation Algorithms CS 1020 - Introduction to Programming (Lab) Aug-Nov 2018 CS 3500 - Operating Systems CS 3510 - Operating Systems Laboratory Jan-April 2018 CS 2800 - Data Structures and Algorithms CS 2810 - Data Structures and Algorithms Laboratory Aug-Nov 2017 CS 3500 - Operating Systems CS 3510 - Operating Systems Laboratory Jan - Apr 2017 CS 2800 - Data Structures and Algorithms CS 2810 - Data Structures and Algorithms Laboratory Aug - Nov 2016 CS 2110 - Programming Laboratory CS 1100 - Computational Engineering (theory) Lecture Notes Aug - Nov 2015 CS 1100 - Computational Engineering Research Group Deepak Rajendraprasad Krithika Ramaswamy Deepu Benson Veena Prabhakaran Ganesh P Cipriyano Simoes Deepa Sara John Additional Information Title Scholarships and Awards Description Google India Anita Borg Memorial Scholarship 2012. Canadian Commonwealth Scholarship 2011-'12. Gold Medal for academic excellence in M. Tech from National Institute of Technology, Calicut. Publications Eternal Vertex Cover on Bipartite Graphs.
